trans-unit.source: Represents a callout annotation.
trans-unit.target: 表示圖說文字註解。

trans-unit.source: A callout annotation is the only annotation that draws a connection between the annotation position and the anchor point.
trans-unit.target: 圖說文字註解是繪製註解位置與錨點之間連線的唯一註解。

trans-unit.source: This class can also display text and automatically calculate its required size.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別也會顯示文字和自動計算其所需的大小。

trans-unit.source: Different callout styles are supported.
trans-unit.target: 支援不同的註標樣式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the annotation position alignment to the anchor point.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註解位置對齊至錨點。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref> value that represents the alignment of the annotation to the anchor point.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"> </xref>值，表示要錨點的註解的對齊方式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the offset that the X-position of the annotation has from the anchor point.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註解的 X 位置有距錨點的位移。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation> must be anchored using either the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A> or the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.AnchorX%2A> property, and its <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.X%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.Double.NaN>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation>必須使用其中一個<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A><xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.AnchorX%2A>屬性，而且它的<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.X%2A>屬性必須設定為<xref:System.Double.NaN>.</xref:System.Double.NaN></xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.X%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.AnchorX%2A>或</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A>錨定</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the offset of the annotation's X-position from the anchor point.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref>表示錨點的註解的 X 位置位移值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the offset that the Y-position of the annotation has from the anchor point.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註解的 Y 位置有距錨點的位移。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation> must be anchored using either the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A> or the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.AnchorY%2A> property, and its <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.Y%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.Double.NaN>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation>必須使用其中一個<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A><xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.AnchorY%2A>屬性，而且它的<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.Y%2A>屬性必須設定為<xref:System.Double.NaN>.</xref:System.Double.NaN></xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.Y%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.AnchorY%2A>或</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A>錨定</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the offset of the annotation's Y-position from the anchor point.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref>表示錨點的註解的 Y 位置位移值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the annotation type name.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註解類型名稱。

trans-unit.source: For internal use, should not be used.
trans-unit.target: 供內部使用，應該不使用。

trans-unit.source: For internal use, should not be used.
trans-unit.target: 供內部使用，應該不使用。

trans-unit.source: The annotation type.
trans-unit.target: 註解類型。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註解的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the annotation background gradient style.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註解背景漸層樣式。

trans-unit.source: Two colors are used to draw the gradient, and are set with the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackColor%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackSecondaryColor%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 兩個色彩用來繪製所使用漸層，並設定<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackColor%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackSecondaryColor%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackSecondaryColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"></xref> enumeration value used to draw the annotation background.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"> </xref>用來繪製註解背景的列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background hatch style of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註解背景影線樣式。

trans-unit.source: Two colors are used to draw the hatching, and are set with the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackColor%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackSecondaryColor%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 兩個色彩用來繪製影線，並設定<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackColor%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackSecondaryColor%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackSecondaryColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"></xref> value used to draw the annotation background.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"> </xref>用來繪製註解背景的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the secondary color for the annotation background.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註解背景次要色彩。

trans-unit.source: This color is used with the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackColor%2A> property when the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackHatchStyle%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackGradientStyle%2A> properties are used.
trans-unit.target: 此色彩會搭配<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackColor%2A>屬性時<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackHatchStyle%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackGradientStyle%2A>屬性可用。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackGradientStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackHatchStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> enumeration value used in conjunction with a primary color to draw the annotation background with hatching or gradient fill.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>搭配主要色彩用於繪製註解背景影線或漸層填滿的列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style for a callout line anchor cap.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註標線錨點端點的樣式。

trans-unit.source: The CalloutAnchorCap property sets the style of the anchor cap for the line that connects the annotation with the anchor point.
trans-unit.target: CalloutAnchorCap 屬性設定，以連接註解錨點線錨點端點的樣式。

trans-unit.source: This property is only applicable when a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutStyle> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutStyle> callout style is used.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性時，才適用<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutStyle>或<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutStyle>圖說文字樣式。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutStyle>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LineAnchorCapStyle"></xref> enumeration value that represents the style to use for a callout line anchor cap.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LineAnchorCapStyle"> </xref>列舉值，表示要使用的註標線錨點端點的樣式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the annotation callout style.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註解註標樣式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutStyle"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutStyle"> </xref>列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the annotation line color.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註解行色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used to draw the annotation line.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>用來繪製註解行尾的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the annotation line style.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註解的線條樣式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle"></xref> enumeration value used to draw the annotation line.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle"> </xref>用來繪製註解行尾的列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the line width of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註解的線條寬度。

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value that represents the annotation line width, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref>值，表示註解的線條寬度，單位為像素。
